author: cms-tau-pog
body:
#### PR description:

As title says: this is to update a depreciated geometry scenario in a configuration to test tau MVAIso discriminator for phase-2; see also issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31081
In addition the test configuration is added to tau unit tests.

#### PR validation:

Tested that updated configuration works. Updated unit tests are also successful.
title: Update geometry scenario in tau test cfg and add the cfg to unit tests
